https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/Tlr1PONwOxfZChrCDf7n5QwpGq.jpg Lucy (Lucille Beatrice Bear) meets a new pet. She calls him Squeaker, because he makes funny noises. One day, he made a lot of damage. Then Lucy remembers that children make TERRIBLE pets. Children Make Terrible Pets
